mapper.select:
SELECT t3.f_floor_name, t3.f_floor_code, t2.f_area_code, t2.f_floor_area_code, t.* FROM t_base_locationinfo t LEFT JOIN t_base_areainfo t2 ON t.f_area_id =t2.f_id LEFT JOIN t_base_floorinfo t3 ON t2.f_floor_id = t3.f_id
ORDER BY t.f_local_code

SELECT t3.f_floor_name, t3.f_floor_code, t2.f_area_code, t2.f_floor_area_code, t.* FROM t_base_locationinfo t LEFT JOIN t_base_areainfo t2 ON t.f_area_id =t2.f_id LEFT JOIN t_base_floorinfo t3 ON t2.f_floor_id = t3.f_id where t.f_group_no =#{groupNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.f_status=0
AND t3.f_floor_code= #{floorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND t3.f_floor_code <> 5
and (t.f_area_block < #{areaBlock,jdbcType=INTEGER} or (t.f_area_block = #{areaBlock,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.f_area_row < #{areaRow,jdbcType=INTEGER})) order by t.f_area_block,t.f_area_row,t.f_area_num asc,t.f_up_down desc

SELECT t3.f_floor_name, t3.f_floor_code, t2.f_area_code, t2.f_floor_area_code, t.* FROM t_base_locationinfo t LEFT JOIN t_base_areainfo t2 ON t.f_area_id =t2.f_id LEFT JOIN t_base_floorinfo t3 ON t2.f_floor_id = t3.f_id where t.f_group_no =#{groupNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.f_status=0
AND t3.f_floor_code= #{floorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND t3.f_floor_code <> 5
and (t.f_area_block > #{areaBlock,jdbcType=INTEGER} or (t.f_area_block = #{areaBlock,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.f_area_row >= #{areaRow,jdbcType=INTEGER})) order by t.f_area_block,t.f_area_row,t.f_area_num asc,t.f_up_down desc

SELECT t3.f_floor_name, t3.f_floor_code, t2.f_area_code, t2.f_floor_area_code, t.* FROM t_base_locationinfo t LEFT JOIN t_base_areainfo t2 ON t.f_area_id =t2.f_id LEFT JOIN t_base_floorinfo t3 ON t2.f_floor_id = t3.f_id
AND t3.f_floor_code <> 5
AND t3.f_floor_code= #{floorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY t.f_local_code asc ,t.f_up_down desc

SELECT count(a.f_id) as loccount,c.f_floor_code,b.f_area_code,a.f_area_block,a.f_area_row, a.f_status,b.f_id as area_id FROM t_base_locationinfo a left join t_base_areainfo b on a.f_area_id=b.f_id left join t_base_floorinfo c on b.f_floor_id=c.f_id where (a.f_group_no ='' or a.f_group_no is null) and a.f_status=0 and c.f_floor_code= '5' group by c.f_floor_code,b.f_area_code,a.f_area_block,a.f_area_row

SELECT t3.f_floor_name, t3.f_floor_code, t2.f_area_code, t2.f_floor_area_code, t.* FROM t_base_locationinfo t LEFT JOIN t_base_areainfo t2 ON t.f_area_id =t2.f_id LEFT JOIN t_base_floorinfo t3 ON t2.f_floor_id = t3.f_id where (t.f_group_no ='' or t.f_group_no is null) and t.f_status=0 AND t3.f_floor_code= '5' ORDER BY t.f_local_code

SELECT count(a.f_id)as countloc, c.f_floor_code ,b.f_area_code,a.f_area_block, a.f_status,b.f_id as area_id FROM t_base_locationinfo a left join t_base_areainfo b on a.f_area_id=b.f_id left join t_base_floorinfo c on b.f_floor_id=c.f_id where a.f_status=0 and a.f_group_no is null group by c.f_floor_code,b.f_area_code,a.f_area_block,a.f_status order by c.f_floor_code,b.f_area_code,a.f_area_block
mapper.update: UPDATE t_base_locationinfo SET f_local_rfid = #{1} WHERE f_local_rfid = #{0}
